sentences: [hɛˈɾɔnɪmo], born July 25, 1988) is a Filipina singer and actress.

sentences: Geronimo rose to prominence in 2002, after winning the television singing contest Star for a Night earning her a recording contract with Viva Records and released her debut album Popstar: A Dream Come True (2003).

sentences: Throughout her career, she has received various awards, including Mnet Asian Music Awards Best Asian Artist in 2012, MTV Europe Music Awards Best Southeast Asian Act in 2014, World Music Awards Best Selling Philippine Artist in 2014, and Classic Rock Roll of Honour Awards Best Asian Performer in 2016.

== Music and voice ==

sentences: Music and voice ==
section: == Music and voice ==

sentences: Geronimo's music is generally pop and sings songs mostly about love.
section: == Music and voice ==

sentences: International producer Christian de Walden praised Geronimo's voice and said "The personality of her voice is phenomenally distinct.
section: == Music and voice ==

sentences: Many have great voices but they tend to imitate foreign divas like Celine Dion, Mariah Carey or Whitney Houston.
section: == Music and voice ==

sentences: She definitely is the biggest talent I have come across within the last ten years...".
section: == Music and voice ==

sentences: Rito P. Asilo of Philippine Daily Inquirer stated in a review of her album: "it's hard to resist the rich and lush quality of her melodies when they fall smoothly and squarely on her confident middle registers" and has praised her transition saying, "her phrasing style to her interchanging shifts in vocal placement, from deep chest tones to heady soft trills, and back which isn't really a bad thing: In fact, it could represent growth because Sarah used to win her admirers solely with the lung-busting high notes."
section: == Music and voice ==

sentences: Sarah Geronimo has received awards and recognition in the entertainment industry (music, film, and television) and from other organizations including different international award-giving bodies such as 12 Awit Awards, 8 Aliw Awards, 28 Myx Music Awards, and a FAMAS Golden Artist Award.

sentences: She has also won the Best Asian Artist at the Mnet Asian Music Awardsin 2012, Best Southeast Asian Act at the MTV Europe Music Awards in 2014, Best Selling Filipino Artist at the 22nd World Music Awards and Best Asian Performer at Classic Rock Roll of Honour Awards in 2016.

sentences: She was inducted into the Anak TV Hall of Fame in 2013.
section: == Awards and accolades ==

sentences: Geronimo is a Goodwill Ambassador for Music of the National Commission for Culture and the Arts and a recipient of their Ani ng Dangal or "Harvest of Honors" state recognition for multi-disciplinary arts.
